Compilation of rating lists
	The Local Government Finance Act 1988 is amended as follows.
	In section 41 (local non-domestic rating lists)—
		in subsection (2A) (date on which English local rating lists must becompiled), in paragraph (b), after “2017” insert “, on 1 April 2023”;
		in subsection (5) (deadline for proposed list to be sent to billingauthority), for “30 September” substitute “31 December”.
	In section 52 (central non-domestic rating lists)—
		in subsection (2A) (date on which English central rating lists must becompiled), in paragraph (b), after “2017” insert “, on 1 April 2023”;
		in subsection (5) (deadline for proposed list to be sent to Secretary ofState or Welsh Ministers), for “30 September” substitute “31 December”.
	In section 54A (postponement of compilation of Welsh lists for 2015onwards)—
		in subsection (4)(b) (date on which Welsh local rating lists must becompiled), after “specified date” insert “, on 1 April 2023”;
		in subsection (5)(b) (date on which Welsh central rating lists must becompiled), after “specified date” insert “, on 1 April 2023”.
Extent and short title
	This Act extends to England and Wales.
	This Act may be cited as the Non-Domestic Rating (Lists) Act 2021.
